body_html:
+1, found that it was very slow once turn on tfdbg dump by DumpingDebugWrapperSession, and I post the comparison info about my example training(300 steps), as below:

turn off tfdbg dump:
real 0m9.759s
user 0m8.315s
sys 0m1.625s

turn on tfdbg dump:
real 2m24.094s
user 2m19.819s
sys 0m12.707s

body:
+1, found that it was very slow once turn on tfdbg dump by `DumpingDebugWrapperSession`, and I post the comparison info about my example training(300 steps), as below:

turn off tfdbg dump:
real	0m9.759s
user	0m8.315s
sys	0m1.625s

turn on tfdbg dump:
real	2m24.094s
user	2m19.819s
sys	0m12.707s
